0007695666.details: 2 fast sectors (4 & 5); tess-ebs morph 0.093 & period ~17.554 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.717; eclipses of ~0.5 & ~0.4 mag with secondary nr phase 0.17 (high ecc);
0007695666.notes: need to clip LC regions w/o eclipses for good fit

0022538139.details: 2 fast sectors (8 & 61); tess-ebs morph 0.321 & period ~4.633 d; not showing in Gaia DR3; aka V362 Pup; SpT A2Vs; eclipses of ~0.12 & ~0.01 mag with secondary likely total; shallow secondary eclipses mitigated by their totallity;
0022538139.notes: need to clip distorted LC region in S8 for good fit

0024433067.details: 1 fast sector (5); tess-ebs morph 0.466 & period ~6.186 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe~1.007; SpT K0V+K2V; eclipses of ~0.9 & ~0.6 mag;
0024433067.notes: difficult LC fit - work to do (LD coeffs?)

0030034081.details: 38 fast sectors; tess-ebs morph 0.506 & period ~2.345 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.744; Aka AT Men; Spt G0; eclipses of >0.6 mag;
0030034081.notes: no secondary if using tess-ebs period - need to double it; may need to flatten LCs too;

0030313682.details: 27 fast sectors; tess-ebs morph 0.422 & period ~5.727 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.920; lots of variability - starspots?; eclipses of ~0.17 & ~0.12 mag; secondary eclipse is total;
0030313682.notes: lots of sectors - may just need to choose the cleanest/least variable;

0031054255.details: 3 fast sectors (5,6,32); tess-ebs morph 0.295 & period ~0.874 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.164; SpT M4-5+M4-5; flat LCs (despite short period) with eclipses of ~0.3 mag; trends in LCs resolved with pdcsap; some flares;
0031054255.notes: no secondary if using tess-ebs period - need to double it; too cool for Kurucz grid;

0032759110.details: 1 fast sector (6); tess-ebs morph 0.128 & period ~4.077 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.226; SpT M4.5Ve; eclipses of ~0.17 & ~0.15 mag, some noise & flares;
0032759110.notes: fit very sensitive to LD params (consider logg=5 as likely M-dwarfs);

0037606218.details: 2 fast sectors (6 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.210 & period ~7.836 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.270; flat LCs with eclipses of ~0.12 & 0.02 mag (secondary total); discontinuities in S87;
0037606218.notes: discontinuities in S87 may be handled by detrending; shallowness of secondary mitigated by totallity; fit sensitive to LD params & better teffs from SED fit will help;

0038586438.details: 38 fast sectors; tess-ebs morph 0.368 & period ~1.111 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.527; eclipses of ~0.20 & 0.15 mag; flares; long period variation between sectors;
0038586438.notes: inconsistent fitted results between sectors - flattening may help;

0048658291.details: 1 fast sector (6); tess-ebs morph 0.400 & period ~3.176 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 5.222; eclipses of ~0.09 & ~0.08 mag; some variation & ellipsoidal effect;
0048658291.notes: test fit sensitive to whether reflA/B are fixed - gives widely differing values for k, J, LR & L3;

0052280468.details: 3 fast sectors (6, 7 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.312 & period ~1.137 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 16.997; eclipses of ~0.1 mag; some variation & flares;
0052280468.notes: test fits are very sensitive to LD params and whether reflA/B are fitted;

0053292822.details: 7 fast sectors (8,34,35,61,62,88,89); tess-ebs morph 0.538 & period ~3.290 d; may not be in Gaia DR3 ruwe ???; aka V438 Pup; SpT B3V; eclipses of ~0.23 & ~0.20 mag; stochastic variation (starspots?);
0053292822.notes: TESS-ebs ephemeris does not work; test of S62 can find plausible fit;

0055369219.details: 28 fast sectors (3,27,29-33,35-39,61-66,68-69,87-90,93-96); tess-ebs morph 0.471 & period ~1.980 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 4.262; SpT F2V; eclipses of ~0.08 & ~0.07 mag;
0055369219.notes: TESS-ebs ephemeris does not work (it's half actual per and t0 on shallow eclipse); in TBOSB with per=3.958969; test of S30 can find plausible fit;

0055404385.details: 37 fast sectors; tess-ebs morph 0.324 & period ~2.952 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.066; aka AR Dor; SpT F5V; eclipses of ~0.12 & ~0.04 mag; starspots;
0055404385.notes: test fit of S2 finds warnings & possibly evolved secondary;

0055497281.details: 41 fast sectors; tess-ebs morph 0.070 & period ~14.905 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.989; aka AL Dor; SpT F8V; in debcat; eclipses of ~0.5 & ~0.4 mag;
0055497281.notes: in debcat & already well characterised - may exclude;characterised in 2021A&A...649A.109G;

0055659311.details: 26 fast sectors; tess-ebs morph 0.049 & period ~31.113 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe ????; manual dist from Gaia DR2 ~500 pc; eclipses of ~0.25 mag;
0055659311.notes: test fit of S1+2 finds plausible fit;

0063192395.details: 3 fast sectors (6, 7 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.528 & period ~3.065 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.259; eclipses of ~0.33 & ~0.30 mag; some ellipsoidal effect; eclipses have shifted phase by +0.05 by sector 87;

0063579446.details: 2 fast sectors (7 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.382 & period ~5.583 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.003; sector 87 heavily distorted; eclipses of ~0.35 & ~0.30 mag; some slow variability;

0066602813.details: 6 fast sectors (7,33,34,61,87,88); tess-ebs morph 0.352 & period ~2.764 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.985; eclipses of ~0.6 & ~0.2 mag; slow variability - starspot?;
0066602813.notes: S7 is cleanest sector as jktebop finds a plausible fit;

0077158150.details: 2 fast sectors (4 & 5); tess-ebs morph 0.466 & period ~2.487 d; not found in Gaia DR3 ruwe ????; aka RZ Cae; eclipses of ~0.25 & ~0.15 mag; slight ellipsoidal effect; distorted region in S4;
0077158150.notes: not found in DR3 so need to source distance elsewhere;

0078450017.details: 2 fast sectors (7 & 33); tess-ebs morph 0.344 & period ~1.888 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 2.946; eclipses of ~0.1 mag; slow variability; flares;
0078450017.notes: test fits & ebop maven fit different values for each sector - may need to flatten for the variability;

0078568736.details: 3 fast sectors (6, 7 & 33); tess-ebs morph 0.159 & period ~8.220 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.738; SpT G; eclipses of ~0.55 & ~0.11 mag; slow variability;
0078568736.notes: test fits & ebop maven fit different values for each sector - may need to flatten for the variability;

0080556181.details: 2 fast sectors (7 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.481 & period ~2.820 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.705; eclipses of ~0.40 & ~0.26 mag; secondary eclipse may be total; eclipses show a phase shift of approximately -0.04 between the sectors;
0080556181.notes: S7 is an easy fit & no MC errors

0080650858.details: 4 fast sectors (7, 8, 61 & 62); tess-ebs morph 0.517 & period ~1.916 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.963; aka BH Pup; SpT B3/5III; eclipses of ~0.32 & ~0.10 mag; some variability; S8 heavily distorted after mid-sector break; secondary eclipse may be total;

0118313102.details: 8 fast sectors (8-10, 35, 36, 61-63); tess-ebs morph 0.180 & period ~9.256 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.962; aka NT Vel; SpT B6V(n); deep eclipses of ~0.69 & ~0.66 mag; clear pulsations; S8 distorted after mid-sector break;

0140209204.details: 1 fast sector (5); tess-ebs morph 0.528 & period ~2.752 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.868; aka SV Col; deep eclipses of ~0.46 & ~0.44 mag; ellipsoidal effect;

0140659978.details: 33 fast sectors (5-8,27-33,35-39,61-69,87-90,93-96); tess-ebs morph 0.090 & period ~9.440 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.830; eclipses of ~0.15 & ~0.08 mag; variability (starspots?);
0140659978.notes: likely need flattening to deal with out of eclipse variability

0141685465.details: 26 fast sectors (4-13, 61-65, 67-69, 87-90, 93-96); tess-ebs morph 0.220 & period ~7.807 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.882; flat LCs with eclipses of ~0.28 & ~0.06 mag;

0147975720.details: 2 fast sectors (6 & 7); tess-ebs morph 0.179 & period ~2.850 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 19.278; eclipses of ~0.3 mag; slow variability; flares;
0147975720.notes: no secondary visible with tess-ebs period;

0149629043.details: 15 fast sectors (9-13, 61, 62, 64, 65, 67, 69, 87-89, 94, 96); tess-ebs morph 0.455 & period ~2.188 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.177; eclipses of ~0.35 & ~0.33 mag;
0149629043.notes: noticable variation in eclipse depths between sectors - L3?

0150361911.details: 16 fast sectors (9-13, 62-68, 87, 89, 90, 94, 95); tess-ebs morph 0.461 & period ~2.494 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.937;eclipses of ~0.25 & ~0. mag;
0150361911.notes: some variation in eclipse depths between sectors - L3?;eclipses shift phase by ~0.03 between early & late sectors

0153709888.details: 2 fast sectors (4 & 5); tess-ebs morph 0.391 & period ~2.166 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 0.938; eclipses of ~0.08 mag; slight variation between sectors;
0153709888.notes: double tess-ebs period; better fit found by combining the sectors; standard fit finds L3 approx -0.3;

0160328766.details: 4 fast sectors (6, 32, 33 & 87); tess-ebs morph 0.199 & period ~10.318 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.148; aka AW Col; SpT A3(m)A7-A7; eclipses of ~0.50 & ~0.15 mag; all sectors have at least 1 of each eclipse type;
0160328766.notes: well detached and highly eccentric; fix reflA/B to avoid warnings;

0167304040.details: 20 fast sectors (9-13, 61-67, 69, 87-89, 93-96); tess-ebs morph 0.346 & period ~5.819 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.123; eclipses of ~0.24 & ~0.22 mag;
0167304040.notes: eccentric with some negatic phase shift on later sectors; trouble fitting S61, however S9, 10, 62 & 63 are consistent;

0167747439.details: 4 fast sectors (5, 6, 32, 33); tess-ebs morph 0.462 & period ~6.131 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 1.052; eclipses of ~0.06 & ~0.01 mag; slight ellipsoidal effect; shallow eclipses mitigated by the secondary being total;
0167747439.notes: uncrowded field so consider fixing L3 at zero;

0167756615.details: 1 fast sectors (5); tess-ebs morph 0.159 & period ~19.430 d; Gaia DR3 ruwe 2.227; SpT F5V; eclipses of ~0.18 & ~0.13 mag; despite longer period, one of each eclipse type;
0167756615.notes: slightly eccentric; test fits hint at evolved secondary;
